title: Ep 147: Sorry For What Happened in Class with Tunde Oyeneyin
itunes:title: Ep 147: Sorry For What Happened in Class with Tunde Oyeneyin
itunes:subtitle: Kate seals the moisture into her face with the perfect ratio of occlusion and humectants, and Doree tries a product people are obsessed with to mixed reviews. Then, the iconic red-lipped Peloton instructor Tunde Oyeneyin joins them to talk skincare of ...
description:
Kate seals the moisture into her face with the perfect ratio of occlusion and humectants, and Doree tries a product people are obsessed with to mixed reviews. Then, the iconic red-lipped Peloton instructor Tunde Oyeneyin joins them to talk skincare of a professional cycling teacher, all things Peloton-related, how her Speak-Up Ride came together and was transformative, and why slowing down is so important. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

 

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
